Minted(address,uint256).notice: Event emitted when a token `tokenId` is minted for `owner`

Revoked(address,uint256).notice: Event emitted when token `tokenId` of `owner` is revoked

balanceOf(address).notice: Count all tokens assigned to an owner

params.owner: Address for whom to query the balance

delegate(address,address).notice: Grant one-time minting right to `operator` for `owner` An allowed operator can call the function to transfer rights.

params.operator: Address allowed to mint a token
params.owner: Address for whom `operator` is allowed to mint a token

delegateBatch(address[],address[]).notice: Grant one-time minting right to a list of `operators` for a corresponding list of `owners` An allowed operator can call the function to transfer rights.

params.operators: Addresses allowed to mint a token
params.owners: Addresses for whom `operators` are allowed to mint a token

hasValid(address).notice: Check if an address owns a valid token in the contract

params.owner: Address for whom to check the ownership

returns._0: True if `owner` has a valid token, false otherwise

isDelegate(address,address).notice: Check if an operator is a delegate for a given address

returns._0: True if the `operator` is a delegate for `owner`, false otherwise

isDelegateOf(address).notice: Check if you are a delegate for a given address

returns._0: True if the caller is a delegate for `owner`, false otherwise

isValid(uint256).notice: Check if a token hasn't been revoked

returns._0: True if the token is valid, false otherwise

issuerOf(uint256).notice: Get the issuer of a token

mint(address).notice: Mint a token. Caller must have the right to mint for the owner.

params.owner: Address for whom the token is minted

mintBatch(address[]).notice: Mint tokens to multiple addresses. Caller must have the right to mint for all owners.

params.owners: Addresses for whom the tokens are minted

returns._0: Descriptive name of the tokens in this contract
An abbreviated name of the tokens in this contract

tokenByIndex(uint256).notice: Get a tokenId by it's index, where 0 <= index < total()

tokenOfOwnerByIndex(address,uint256).notice: Get the tokenId of a token using its position in the owner's list

params.owner: Address for whom to get the token

tokenURI(uint256).notice: URI to query to get the token's metadata
